title: 1 GB nightly
info: 1 GB Internet for 1 night at the price of 25 Afghanis. It can be used from 11:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. To activate *477*25*1#.

title: 3 GB nightly
info: 3 GB Internet for 7 nights at the price of 75 Afghanis. It can be used from 11 pm to 7 am. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. To activate Dial *477*75*2#.

title: 7GB nightly
info: 7 GB Internet for 30 nights at the price of 199 Afghanis. It can be used from 11 pm to 7 am. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. To activate Dial *477*199*1#.
